stages.instructions: Phase: draft. Read SKILL.md and references (as needed). Extract requirements, constraints, roles, inputs/outputs, and evaluation criteria. Record concise summaries in /draft and evidence in /facts.

Phase: draft. Produce or update a detailed test plan with rationale in docs/ai-agent-reviews/ai-agent-collaboration-exec_test_plan_2026-01-05.md. Keep /draft updated with a short summary and file path only.
